name: Toradex Verdin imx8mm

specs.RAM: 2 GB LPDDR4 32-Bit data bus with inline ECC (1500 MT/s)

description: The Verdin imx8m mini is a cost-effective Computer on Module (CoM) based on the NXP imx8m mini processor, offering up to four Cortex-A53 cores. It features integrated Wi-Fi 5 and Bluetooth 5.3, Torizon’s OTA updates, device monitoring, and remote access. Designed for power-constrained applications, the Verdin imx8m mini includes advanced power management and hardware-based security for secure boot and cryptographic acceleration.
shortDescription: Powerful Cortex®-A53 based device for embedded Linux.
getStartedInstructions:
1. Open the project folder and update the submodules: `git submodule update --init --recursive` 
2. Follow the guide in the [README](https://github.com/lvgl/lv_port_linux/blob/master/boards/toradex-verdin_imx8m-mini/README.md#getting-started)
